tweet: There were people of all political parties, religions, races, and ethnic groups to stand up against divisive rhetoric, to watch for misuse of social media by those here at home and foreign adversaries, and fight to fund education and law enforcement.

What a beautiful show of unity today at the Nassau County March Against Anti-Semitism organized by @NassauExecutive Laura Curran and Suffolk County Executive @SteveBellone ! It was an honor to speak and it was so uplifting to see so many people show up to Stop the Hate! pic.twitter.com/kf56jlGVD2

Today, I met with representatives from @TCCNewYork the largest Turkish American grassroots organization in the country. We discussed the ongoing human rights abuses by the Erdogan regime and its impact on Turkish Americans in our communities. pic.twitter.com/gUOjaS2VFt

Happy 101st Birthday to my predecessor, former Congressman @RepWolff, the oldest living member of Congress!
